tutorial.speak:
Tasks are a great way to assign jobs within your organization. Start by clicking on the Tasks icon on the Chums homepage.
Click the plus symbol to add a new task.
First, associate the task with someone in your church who is assigning it.
You can select either a person or a group as the assigner.
Next, assign the task to someone who will be completing it.
Again, you can choose either a person or a group as the assignee.
Give the task a title describing what needs to be accomplished. You may add an optional note, then click Save.
The task will appear in your task list when you click the task icon. To mark a task as complete, click on the task name and select "closed".
